## Install Libraries
install.packages("readr")
install.packages("gglplot2")

## Load Libraries 
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

## Import Data
cov_ic_admissions <- read_csv2("../datasets/04-10/COVID-19_ic_opnames.csv")
cov_hospital_admissions <- read_csv2("../datasets/04-10/COVID-19_ziekenhuisopnames.csv")
cov_admissions_ranked_by_age <- read_csv2("../datasets/04-10/COVID-19_ziekenhuis_ic_opnames_per_leeftijdsgroep.csv")

## Clean Data


## Create Plots
ggplot(data = cov_ic_admissions, mapping = aes(x = Date_of_statistics, y = IC_admission)) + geom_point()
ggplot(data = cov_hospital_admissions, mapping = aes(x = Date_of_statistics, y = Hospital_admission)) + geom_point()
ggplot(data = cov_admissions_ranked_by_age, mapping = aes(x = Age_group, y = IC_admission)) + geom_point()
ggplot(data = cov_admissions_ranked_by_age, mapping = aes(x = Age_group, y = Hospital_admission)) + geom_point()
